definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
material and spiritual culture/matter and mind/material progress, ideology and culture (philosophic slogan, adopted into Deng Xiaoping theory from 1978)
pinyin: wu4 zhi4 wen2 ming2 he2 jing1 shen2 wen2 ming2

sentences.english: Of the socialist material civilization and spiritual civilization construction has made remarkable achievements.
sentences.chinese: 社會主義物質文明和精神文明建設取得顯著成果。

sentences.english: The Sunni caliph is the spiritual and political head of the community.
sentences.chinese: 遜尼派哈里發，是精神文明建設和政治領導社會。

sentences.english: Ruyuan the coordinated development of spiritual civilization, all-round social progress.
sentences.chinese: 乳源精神文明協調發展，社會事業全面進步。

sentences.english: New Achievements Accomplished in Terms of the Party Construction and Cultural and Ideological Progress.
sentences.chinese: 黨建和精神文明建設取得新成就。

sentences.english: Promoting Socialist Culture and Ethics, Improving Democracy and the Legal System , and Strengthening National Defense.
sentences.chinese: 加強精神文明和民主法制建設，加強國防建設。

sentences.english: Similarly, socialist spiritual civilization exerts a direct in…
sentences.chinese: 但社會主義精神文明又直接影響和作用於黨風。

sentences.english: Further create non-toxic community to promote spiritual civilization construction.
sentences.chinese: 深入創建無毒社區促進精神文明建設。

sentences.english: Fifth, equal attention has been attached to improving material civilization and socialist culture and ethnics.
sentences.chinese: 五是堅持物質文明和精神文明兩手抓。

sentences.english: Thus there is in Scripture a successive spiritualization of the idea of Atonement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在經文中連續開展精神文明的構思贖罪。

sentences.english: Is a major achievement of spiritual civilization.
sentences.chinese: 是精神文明的重大成果。

sentences.english: Similarly, socialist spiritual civilization exerts a direct influence on the party members' …
sentences.chinese: 但社會主義精神文明又直接影響和作用於黨風。

sentences.english: Nanhai is also an advanced country in its rural ideological civilization.
sentences.chinese: 南海市也是廣東省的農村精神文明先進市。

sentences.english: The moral education in high schools are an important part included in the contents of socialistic spiritual civilization constructing.
sentences.chinese: 中學德育教育是社會主義精神文明建設的重要內容。

sentences.english: For this region economy and spiritual civilization.
sentences.chinese: 爲本地區經濟和精神文明服務。

definition: material and spiritual culture/matter and mind/material progress, ideology and culture (philosophic slogan, adopted into Deng Xiaoping theory from 1978)
pinyin: wu4 zhi4 wen2 ming2 he2 jing1 shen2 wen2 ming2

definition: society in which the material needs of most citizens are adequately met
Scientific Outlook on Development, a guiding principle for the CCP attributed to Hu Jintao 胡錦濤|胡锦涛[Hu2 Jin3 tao1], incorporated into the Constitution of the CCP in 2007
